alert.note: Alert for Barton; Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 23 at 2:53AM CDT until October 23 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Russell and Barton Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 10 AM this morning to 8 PM CDT this evening. For the Wind Advisory, from 8 PM this evening to 1 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
